TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event occurs when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> is added or removed from a managed collection of such lists. This event is not raised when an individual list element changes its value.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is generated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods are executed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object relatedObject, valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType changeType, class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection actionLists) cil managed

Docs.param: The object that is associated with the collection.
A value that specifies whether a has been added or removed from the collection.
The collection of list elements after the action has been applied.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter will always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of objects associated with this event.
Docs.value: A that represents the current state of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The retrieved <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> represents the state of the collection after the event, which involved adding or removing an element, has been applied.

Docs.returns: A that represents the current state of the collection.

Docs.summary: Gets a flag indicating whether an element has been added or removed from the collection of objects.
Docs.value: A that indicates the type of change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Altering the contents of an existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> in the collection will not raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.

Docs.returns: A that indicates the type of change.

Docs.summary: Gets the object that that is associated with the collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class.
For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the RelatedObject property should always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
